posts.post_title: F/S - T206 SGC, Old Mill - All Sold
posts.post_content:
Last of my T206 cards for sale.  Shipping included in prices.  Paypal (gift), checks or money orders are acceptable.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url] .  Thanks!  Kevin
